root.title: compani set bid for canada helicopt contract
root.body: e.h industri canada inc say plan bid eh101 helicopt replac canada fleet sea king aircraft It say join bell textron canada canadian marconi Co cmw imp group paramax electron inc support augusta s.p.a sikorski aircraft westland group bid the eh101 aim detect engag submarin design use british italian navi due enter servic 1992 e.h say
